DATA: TEXT1(30) VALUE 'This is the first text', "LOC 1 TEXT2(30) VALUE 'This is the second text', "LOC 2 TEXT3(30) VALUE 'This is the third text', "LOC 3 STRING(5) VALUE 'eco'. "LOC 4
IF TEXT1 CS STRING. "LOC 5 WRITE / 'Condition 1 is fulfilled'. "LOC 6 ELSEIF TEXT2 CS STRING. "LOC 7 WRITE / 'Condition 2 is fulfilled'. "LOC 8 ELSEIF TEXT3 CS STRING. "LOC 9 WRITE / 'Condition 3 is fulfilled'. "LOC 10 ELSE. "LOC 11 WRITE / 'No condition is fulfilled'. "LOC 12 ENDIF. "LOC 13

"&vTitulo&"

" end if %>
>
<%=Titulo%>
<% End Function Function CierraCaja() %>
<% End Function %>

# ------------------------------------------------------------------ # @1 # ------------------------------------------------------------------
DATABASE dummy
define wtime datetime year to second
MAIN
LET wtime = current year to second LET wmessage = "Start - : ",wtime clipped DISPLAY wmessage clipped
LET ls_sql =" Select numinvoice from invoices " PREPARE psel_invoices FROM ls_sql DECLARE qsel_concprefact cursor with hold for psel_invoices
LET wtime = current year to second LET wmessage = "End - ", wtime clipped DISPLAY wmessage clipped
END MAIN

import java.lang.ref.PhantomReference; //LOC 1 import java.lang.ref.ReferenceQueue; //LOC 2
public class INDDPRID0309 extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet { //LOC 3
protected void finalize() throws Throwable { //LOC 4 try { //LOC 5 ReferenceQueue refQueue = getQueue(); //LOC 6 PhantomReference ref = new PhantomReference(this , refQueue); //LOC 7 ref.enqueue(); //LOC 8 } //LOC 9 finally { //LOC 10 super .finalize(); //LOC 11 } //LOC 12 } //LOC 13
private ReferenceQueue getQueue() { //LOC 14 return _queue; //LOC 15 } //LOC 16
private transient ReferenceQueue _queue; //LOC 17
} //LOC 18

<?xml version = '1.0' encoding = 'UTF-8'?> <Module version="101020002" xmlns="http://xmlns.oracle.com/Forms"> <FormModule> <ProgramUnit Name="CARGAR_LISTAS" ProgramUnitType="Procedimiento" ProgramUnitText="PROCEDURE CARGAR_LISTAS IS&#10;BEGIN&#10; :BLACTUPLANCO01.T_TIPCUENTA := '*'; &#10; :BLACTUPLANCO01.T_TIPIVA := '*'; &#10; --:BLACTUPLANCO02.T_TIPCUENTA := '*'; &#10; :BLACTUPLANCO02.T_TIPCUENTA := null; &#10; :BLACTUPLANCO02.T_TIPIVA := '*'; &#10;END;"/> <ProgramUnit Name="ACTIVAR_ITEM" ProgramUnitType="Procedimiento" ProgramUnitText="Procedure ACTIVAR_ITEM ( Bloque In Varchar2,&#10; Item In Varchar2,&#10; SiNo In Boolean ) Is&#10; BloqueItem Varchar2(50) := Bloque||'.'||Item; &#10;Begin &#10; If Get_Item_Property(BloqueItem, Insert_Allowed) = 'TRUE' And Not SiNo Then&#10; Set_Item_Property(BloqueItem, Insert_Allowed, Property_False);&#10; Set_Item_Property(BloqueItem, Update_Allowed, Property_False);&#10; Set_Item_Property(BloqueItem, Navigable , Property_False);&#10; ElsIf Get_Item_Property(BloqueItem, Insert_Allowed) = 'FALSE' And SiNo Then &#10; Set_Item_Property(BloqueItem, Insert_Allowed, Property_True);&#10; Set_Item_Property(BloqueItem, Update_Allowed, Property_True);&#10; Set_Item_Property(BloqueItem, Navigable , Property_True);&#10; End If;&#10;End;"/> <ProgramUnit Name="BACKGROUND_ITEM" ProgramUnitType="Procedimiento" ProgramUnitText="Procedure BACKGROUND_ITEM ( Bloque In Varchar2,&#10; Item In Varchar2,&#10; Color In Varchar2 ) Is&#10; /* r225g225b225 Gray12 &#10; r255g255b255 White */ &#10; BloqueItem Varchar2(50) := Bloque||'.'||Item; &#10;Begin &#10; If Get_Item_Property(BloqueItem, BackGround_Color) = 'r225g225b225' And Color = 'r255g255b255' Then&#10; Set_Item_Property(BloqueItem, Visual_Attribute, 'ATT_WHITE'); &#10; ElsIf Get_Item_Property(BloqueItem, BackGround_Color) = 'r255g255b255' And Color = 'r225g225b225' Then&#10; Set_Item_Property(BloqueItem, Visual_Attribute, 'ATT_GRAY12'); &#10; End If;&#10;End;"/> </FormModule> </Module>

-- Des: -- Seleccion de registro de recuparben, redatcueco y del campo xparbere -- His: -- 27-04-2006 s8834 -- Creacion Inicial -- T select ben.*, cue.*, cto.xparbere --LOC 1 from recuparben ben, redatcueco cue, redatconce cto --LOC 2 where ben.nidcucon = cue.nidcucon and --LOC 3 cue.nidconre = cto.nidconre and --LOC 4 ben.fliqcuco = ? and --LOC 5 cto.ffivaldt = (select min(ffivaldt) --LOC 6 from redatconce xxx --LOC 7 where cto.nidconre = xxx.nidconre and --LOC 8 xxx.ffivaldt >= ?) and --LOC 9 cto.xparbere != XPARBERE_NOPARTICIPA --LOC 10 order by ben.nidcucon; --LOC 11

/****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[PR_IMSG_COTA_USUARIO_CARTEIRA] Script Date: 08/13/2012 11:48:49 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS OFF --LOC 1 GO --LOC 2 SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER OFF --LOC 3 GO --LOC 4 CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[PR_IMSG_COTA_USUARIO_CARTEIRA] --LOC 5 @p_ID_CADASTRO AS BIGINT = 0 OUTPUT, --LOC 6 @p_ID_PARAMETRO AS INT = NULL, --LOC 7 @p_CD_USUARIO AS VARCHAR(15) = NULL, --LOC 8 @p_CD_USUARIO_ALTERACAO AS VARCHAR(15) = NULL, --LOC 9 @p_DT_INCLUSAO AS DATETIME = NULL, --LOC 10 @p_DT_EXCLUSAO AS DATETIME = NULL, --LOC 11 @p_IC_NOVA AS BIT = 0 --LOC 12 AS --LOC 13 BEGIN --LOC 14
IF (@p_ID_CADASTRO <> 0) --LOC 15 BEGIN --LOC 16
UPDATE TBPL_MSG_COTA_USUARIO_CARTEIRA SET CD_USUARIO_ALTERACAO = @v_CD_USUARIO_ALTERACAO, DT_EXCLUSAO = @v_DT_EXCLUSAO --LOC 17 WHERE ID_CADASTRO = @p_ID_CADASTRO --LOC 18
END --LOC 19 ELSE --LOC 20 BEGIN --LOC 21
DELETE FROM TBPL_MSG_COTA_USUARIO_CARTEIRA --LOC 22
SET @p_ID_CADASTRO = @@IDENTITY --LOC 23
END --LOC 24 END --LOC 25 GO --LOC 26

VERSION 1.0 CLASS 'LOC 1 BEGIN 'LOC 2 MultiUse = -1 'True 'LOC 3 Persistable = 0 'NotPersistable 'LOC 4 DataBindingBehavior = 0 'vbNone 'LOC 5 DataSourceBehavior = 0 'vbNone 'LOC 6 MTSTransactionMode = 0 'NotAnMTSObject 'LOC 7 END 'LOC 8 'Control de locx vbalGrid_ Option Explicit 'Control de locx vbalGrid 'LOC 9 Public obG As vbalGrid 'LOC 10 ' Public Function RowMatch(ByVal p_vaSearch As Variant, p_svClauColumna As String) As Long 'LOC 11 Dim i As Long 'LOC 12 Dim j As Long 'LOC 13
With Me.obG 'LOC 14 j = .ColumnIndex(p_svClauColumna) 'LOC 15 For i = 1 To .Rows 'LOC 16 If .CellText(i, j) = p_vaSearch Then 'LOC 17 RowMatch = i 'LOC 18 Exit Function 'LOC 19 End If 'LOC 20 Next i 'LOC 21 End With 'LOC 22 End Function 'LOC 23

Imports Bde.Aps.Gtc.Comunes.Datos.AccesoDatos ' 1 Imports Bde.Aps.Gtc.Comunes.Datos.AccesoDatos.Gea ' 2 Imports Bde.Aps.Gtc.Comunes.Datos.DataSets.Gea ' 3 Imports Bde.Aps.Gtc.AccesoGem.Negocio ' 4
Public NotInheritable Class clsConceptosAgregados ' 5
Private Conexion As clsConexion ' 6
Public Sub New(ByVal conexion As clsConexion) ' 7 Me.Conexion = conexion ' 8 End Sub ' 9
Public Function DameValorConceptoAgregado(ByVal versionForcon As String) As Decimal ' 10
Dim gestor As New clsDSConceptosAgregados(Conexion) ' 11 Dim ds As DSTConceptosAgregados ' 12 Dim filaEncontrada As DSTConcepAgregados.GTC_T_CONCEPTOS_AGREGADOSRow = Nothing ' 13 ds = gestor.DameDS(versionForcon, codConcepto, planContable, tipoCuestionario) ' 14
If ds Is Nothing OrElse ds.GTC_T_CONCEPTOS_AGREGADOS.Rows.Count <> 1 Then ' 15 Dim cBusca As New clsBuscaAgregado ' 16 Dim ifc As New ifcProcedimientosGem ' 17
ifc.ConsultaCNAE(agrupacion, clasificacion, sector, granSector) ' 18
ar = cBusca.DameAgregado(agrupacion, sector, granSector, tamanyo) ' 19
For Each idAgregado As clsIdAgregado In ar ' 20 ds = gestor.DameDS(versionForcon, codConcepto, planContable, tipoCuestionario) ' 21
If ds Is Nothing OrElse ds.GTC_T_CONCEPTOS_AGREGADOS.Rows.Count <> 1 Then ' 22 Else ' 23 filaEncontrada = Direct(ds.GTC_T_CONCEPTOS_AGREGADOS.Rows(0)) ' 24 Exit For ' 25 End If ' 26 Next ' 27
If Not filaEncontrada Is Nothing Then ' 28 If actualAnterior = 1 Then ' 29 Return filaEncontrada.VALOR_ANTERIOR ' 30 End If ' 31 Else ' 32 Return 0 ' 33 End If ' 34
End If ' 35 End Function ' 36
End Class ' 37

i18n.name: Líneas de código
i18n.description:
Número de líneas de código. Serán líneas de código las líneas del fichero que no son líneas en blanco ni comentarios. Las líneas del fichero que comparten código fuente y comentarios se contabilizarán sólo como líneas de código.
LOC es una métrica fácil de entender, pero por sí misma no dice mucho sobre características del software, así que normalmente se usa para calcular otras métricas derivadas (como, por ejemplo, promedio de líneas por función) que dan más información sobre la calidad técnica.

implementation-descriptions.implementation-description:
Número de líneas de código.
NOTA: La métrica ignora las líneas contenidas dentro de scriptlets <% ... %>, declaraciones <%! ... %> y directivas de importación <%@ page import=... %> Estas líneas se contabilizan aplicando la métrica correspondiente de la tecnología JAVA sobre los ficheros JSP.
Número de líneas del fichero XML generado a partir de Oracle Forms.

i18n.name: Lines of code
i18n.description:
Number of lines of code. Lines of code are those lines of the file that are neither blank lines nor comments. The lines of the file that share source code and comments are counted only as line of code.
LOC is an easy to understand metric, but by itself says little about software characteristics, so it is typically used in other relative metrics (for example, average lines per function), that are more expressive regarding technical quality.

implementation-descriptions.implementation-description:
Number of lines of code.
NOTE: The metric ignores lines contained on scriptlets <% ... %>, declarations <%! ... %> and import directives <%@ page import=...%> Those lines are counted with the proper metric of the JAVA technology applied over the JSP files.
Number of lines of XML file created from Oracle Forms.
